title: Summoner not found - Username and Summoner name differences.
body:
Hello,

I am having some issues verifying with another outside client that is a tournament based platform.
I am having difficulty showing my summoner on any stats site. or that I am even ranked, when in-fact I am ranked.

My Username and Summoner name are both different due to a previous name change that has taken place some time ago, 
What might be the issue here and how might it be resolved for my summoner to be recognized ??

replies.body:
I took a look at the account you are posting from and it looks like it's still going through placement matches and the name is up to date.  Sometimes there are delays with third party sites updating their content, or might not at all until after placements are finished.  While we can't force syncs or support third party sites to update their features, I can confirm your account looks to be in good shape.

If you need some additional information for the account or recovering it, our support team will be happy to help out by [submitting a ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)
